markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Sod Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2977)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Sod hounds are mossy extraplanar canines formed of packed dirt and pebbles. On their native plane, they are often tasked with guarding less secure sites and finding mineral deposits. Others live in the comparative lap of luxury as pets to [jabali](/Monsters.aspx?ID=213).

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Sod_Hound.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Sod Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2977)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=585" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 142 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; crystal sense ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 60 feet, [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** -1

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Crystal Sense** A sod hound can sense crystals or gems within 60 feet as if using the [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ability.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 44

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; earth glide

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d10+6 piercing plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=46)

**Earth Glide**   The sod hound can [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310) through any earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, the sod hound moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-409" />
name: Sod Hound
